product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Smart Travel First-Aid Kit
long_description: Whether you're traveling abroad or taking a trip across the USA, the Adventure Medical Smart Travel first-aid kit has all the essentials to keep you comfortable and in good health during the journey.
short_description: Whether you're traveling abroad or taking a trip across the USA, the Adventure Medical Smart Travel first-aid kit has all the essentials to keep you comfortable and in good health during the journey.
